com.facebook.stats

Interface EventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>

  • Type Parameters:
    C -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompositeEventCounterIf<C>, EventCounter, GaugeCounter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCompositeCounter, AbstractCompositeSum, AssociativeAggregationCounter, CompositeGaugeCounter, CompositeMax, CompositeMin, CompositeSum, DecayCounter, DefaultGaugeCounter, EventCounterImpl, FastGaugeCounter, MaxEventCounter, MinEventCounter, SumEventCounter

    public interface EventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
    counter object representing some value over a timespan [start, end) mutable via the add() metthod

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      C merge(C counter)
      Produces a merged counter that spans the range of both counters and contains the sum value.

      • merge

        C merge(C counter)
        Produces a merged counter that spans the range of both counters and contains the sum value. guarantees that the underlying implementation will be the same as the LHS (Composite, single)
        Parameters:
        counter - : counter to merge with. Merge implementation behavior is not defined if the contents of the input counter are modified; the resulting counter returned may be invalid or a ConcurrentModificationException may be thrown, depending.
        Returns:
        new EventCounter resulting from merging this and counter
